did.abstract: Minutes, 1868-1881, 1895-1899, and 1905-1916, of the Webster Debating Society of the University of Michigan, a law school student organization.

repository.corpname: Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

acqinfo.p: The records were received from donor no. 343.

accessrestrict.p: The record group is open without restriction.

userestrict.p: The collection is entirely in the public domain.

prefercite.p: [item], folder, box, Webster Debating Society (University of Michigan) Minute Books, Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

bioghist.p: The Webster Debating Society was a student organization of the University of Michigan law school.

scopecontent.p: The collection comprises six volumes of minutes.
